Metro Metro Dropped Its Complete 2020 Lineup Alongside A Monstrous Contest

Posted by Brittany Prevost on February 19, 2020

TICKETS

It's that time of the year again! Official lineup announcements are dropping left and right. Recently, Metro Metro followed suit by unleashing an astonishing lineup and monstrous contest ahead of its highly anticipated second edition. Seriously, you're going to want to check this one out!

Setting the tone for other world-renowned Canadian festivals, the organizers behind Metro Metro proved that this year's event will be another one for the books! On Friday, May 15, 2020, to Sunday, May 17, 2020, the festival that's gunning for the title of biggest urban music festival in Canada will be making its triumphant return to Montreal's Olympic Stadium. 

Last year's inauguration involved endless hours of curating a lineup which would feature some of the biggest names in hip hop alongside some the best production in the game. This year, Metro Metro is not only living up to these promises, but have single-handedly surpasses even their toughest critics expectations.

Fans can count on legendary performances by esteemed headliners such as Travis Scott, Young Thug and 50 Cent. Other A-list acts include Sheck Wes, Fetty Wap, Lil Pump, Booba, DaBaby, Lil Xan, Roddy Ricch, Danileigh, and that's just to name a few! Note: More artists name have yet to be revealed...

Check out the Complete 2020 Lineup Below: 

The festival is presented by Vidéotron and Motorola and powered by Bud Light, so you know that with top-tier partners this year's event is gearing up to be something truly unique. To make matters even more special, the organizers have launched "an ULTIMATE Metro Metro experience, which includes $2,500 cash, 4 VIP weekend passes and the hotel for the weekend for you and your 3 friends[.]" Follow the instructions below to enter.

Official ticket sales will begin tomorrow, Thursday, February 20, 2020, at 12:00 p.m. EST, here. We can't stress this enough, Flag fam, don't sleep on this! You may be thinking that the Olympic Stadium will not sell out, but with a lineup of this magnitude, we have no doubts that the target won't be hard to miss! Let us know what you think of the lineup via our official social media channels. Will you be attending? 

Written By Brittany Prevost
